name: Mihai Ordean
content: Dr Mihai Ordean - School of Computer Science - University of Birmingham Dr Mihai Ordean School of Computer ScienceLecturer in Computer Science Contact details Emailm.ordean@bham.ac.uk View my research portal AddressSchool of Computer ScienceUniversity of Birmingham Edgbaston Birmingham B15 2TT UK Dr Mihai Ordean is a lecturer for the School of Computer Science, at the University of Birmingham. He is also a member of the Birmingham Centre for Cyber Security and Privacy. His work is aimed at understanding how systems work from a security perspective, identifying flaws, and then proposing improvements. Currently he is working on cellular device security concerning protocol privacy and security, as well as implementations of cellular communication stacks such as LTE and 5G. Some of this work has led to collaborations with standardisation bodies (GSMA, Department of Transport) while other has been covered in the media (e.g. Forbes Magazine).
